text: int main ( void ) { int * * arr , t , n , i , j , maximum ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; arr = ( int * * ) malloc ( sizeof ( int * ) * n ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; ++ i ) { arr [ i - 1 ] = ( int * ) malloc ( sizeof ( int ) * i ) ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; ++ i ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; ++ j ) scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] [ j ] ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; ++ i ) arr [ i ] [ 0 ] += arr [ i - 1 ] [ 0 ] ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; ++ i ) for ( j = 1 ; j <= i ; ++ j ) if ( i == j ) arr [ i ] [ j ] += arr [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] ; else arr [ i ] [ j ] += max ( arr [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] , arr [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ) ; maximum = arr [ n - 1 ] [ 0 ] ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; ++ i ) if ( arr [ n - 1 ] [ i ] > maximum ) maximum = arr [ n - 1 ] [ i ] ; printf ( "%d\n" , maximum ) ; } return 0 ; }
